website_summaries.verdict: Lots of flavor, but the nutritional value of these bars isn't as great as some other brands.
pros: A popular name in granola bars with a variety of flavors consumers love
Made with all-natural ingredients and no artificial flavors
cons: Some consumers note that the formula has changed and the new recipe crumbles easily

customer_reviews.title: ALL THE CRUMBS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nature Valley granola bar addicts know a thing or two about crumbs. But we gladly carry that mantle. It's the price we pay for a deliciously filling hearty breakfast/snack on the go. Putting these delicious little oat bricks on a UPS truck to deliver to your door really ups the crumb ante! Opening the package was like ringing in the New Year with whole-grain confetti. Still delicious. Will probably order again. Just don't open over your lap or in the car.

customer_reviews.title: SELL BY DATE Expired
customer_reviews.text: Bought in July 2018, SELL BY DATE April 2018 Half the boxes have stale bars, I started using them as soon as I received them and by the time I got to the third box I started finding stale bars, at this point it was too late to return. So now I have to go through until I find ones with a little crunch to them. The only reason I still have a ton left is because I really don't want to have to go through them...they are here for when I'm very desperate now. VERY disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Schofield

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a variety pack of Crunchy granola bars. What I received was 3 boxes of Crunchy (all same flavor) and 3 boxes of Sweet n Salty (all same flavor). Might not be a big deal for some but still - it wasn't as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Gary McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Very Tasty I Must Say. Take 2 To Work Every Day For My Lunch. On A Diet. Gives Me Energy After Consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gasper

customer_reviews.title: Great snack for new mamas
customer_reviews.text: These saved my life during the first few weeks and months of being a new mom. They can get messy and crumbly...I would often drop a few crumbs on babys head....don’t tell anyone lol
customer_reviews.author: anareem

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: The are delicious. I eat them with my yogurt every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Picky buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good, portable granola bars
customer_reviews.text: Good, portable granola bars ideal for all day outings and packing in a frisbee-golf bag, diaper bag, or purse for emergency low blood sugars...
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah M

customer_reviews.title: Very crumbly but taste good.
customer_reviews.text: I do disagree with their changing of this product to be "easier to bite". I have bought these locally and off of amazon and every time I open a package, at least 1/3 of the granola bar is broken and crumbled. This makes them very difficult to eat over anything other than a plate due to the mess they create. The convenience factor is out the door. Unless you don't care about your clothes, furniture, work space, or car interior, these are a bad idea. I never found the original version of these difficult to eat. Why change a good thing?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Tried and true. Not too wild about the peanut butter though.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect package for hungry students in the firm away from home!
customer_reviews.author: Banana

customer_reviews.title: granola brs
customer_reviews.text: great. i have bought them before thanks for a good delivery. we now have opened a few bars. they have obviously been mishandled. all that we have opened so far have been broken, with many crumbs. the product must be opened with a napkin under it to catch the many crumbs. poor handling makes for an undesirable product.
customer_reviews.author: richard immekus

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE DEAL THAT U THINK
customer_reviews.text: This is false advertisement said that it was a variety pack I got individual boxes, said it would come with peanut butter and it didn’t , only the originals are crunchy and have 12 bars the chocolate one only has 6 bars I am HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED another at all what I was getting, the boxes were packed in a bigger box and the ones at the end are crumbs from being tossed around and squished
customer_reviews.author: Elaina

customer_reviews.title: Variety pack is yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t care too much for the regular oats flavor so I like the variety pack. The chocolate bars are good, almost on the dark chocolate taste and the peanut butter ones are really good too!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great
customer_reviews.text: These bars crushed up together with yoghurt (and topped with fresh fruit) make a great breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: Yosef

customer_reviews.title: It was such a good deal but my son sill only eat the oats ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these seem stale. It was such a good deal but my son sill only eat the oats and honey because he said the others taste weird. The date is Jan 2017 though.
customer_reviews.author: jaime agnello

customer_reviews.title: Both I and my husband like eating.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious bars for my daughter's snack time. Both I and my husband like eating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nature Valley Granola Bars, Crunchy, Variety Pack of Oats 'n Dark Chocolate, Peanut Butter, Oats 'n Honey, 12-Bars Per Box (Pack of 6)
product_meta.description: Nature Valley Crunchy bars are made with the best ingredients from nature like 100% natural whole grain oats and honey, peanut butter and maple syrup. Enjoy!
feature_bullets: REAL INGREDIENTS: Variety pack bars include wholesome flavors of Oats 'N Dark Chocolate, Peanut Butter, and Oats 'N Honey bars
WHOLESOME SNACK BAR: Tasty snack with no artificial flavors, no artificial colors, and no artificial sweeteners
WHOLE GRAIN: An excellent source of whole grain with 16 grams per serving (At least 48 grams recommended daily)
PERFECTLY PORTABLE: Easy, satisfying bites for convenient snacking at work or on the hiking trail
BOX CONTAINS: Bulk packs of 6 boxes, each with 12 bars per box

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
